casebody.data:
Jack Anthony JORY, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 14-6996. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 12, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until February 2, 2015, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
